attributes.action: urge the Speaker of the House of Commons to resign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of Mr Martins attitude towards MP allowances,and his failure to act decisively, he  should be urged to resign immediately

rejection.details: Speaker Michael Martin announced on May 19 he will step down in June.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
